The action you are about to perform will bind this item to you. Are you sure you want to continue?
Your characters on this server are currently unavailable due to maintenance. Please try again at a later time.
Your account has been disconnected due to an active character transfer. Please follow the Help Center link below for more information.
NOTICE

With the implementation of higher population tech for our servers and the merging of origin server characters to destination servers, there will now be many more players on each of the new High Population Servers. This allows for us to provide the best gameplay experience for our players.
If you have been moved from an Origin server, your new server will be noted in the name plate above. As a result of this migration, some characters may need to be renamed in order to prevent naming conflicts. If one of your characters requires a name change, you will see a red exclamation point by your character's name.
We apologize for any inconvenience that this may cause, but rest assured that several factors have been taken into consideration where naming conflicts occur. For more information on our new High Population Servers, please visit www.swtor.com/transfer .
You have reached the limit for Activated Characters and cannot create additional characters.
Cannot reset or abandon mission - you have reached the maximum number of times you are allowed to do this for the day.

Experience Changes
Free-to-Play Players begin gaining reduced Experience and Valor Points at level 20. Experience reductions can be offset using Experience Boost items found in the Cartel Market.
Subscribers gain Experience Points faster!

ENABLE

In order to better serve you and help maintain the security of your account, all players must supply a valid email address to play high level characters. An email validation can help you recover your account if you lose your password, and protect against account theft. Entering a valid email address can be done at any time at your convenience, but is a requirement to play any character of level 20 or higher. To validate your email address, enter your email address below, click Validate, and then check your email and follow the instructions given there. You may also do this later on your account page at .

Please enter your email address
If you have entered a valid and unused email then you will receive a verification email soon. Please check your email and follow the instructions before playing your character again
